PackageOracle.name: DA_INTERACTIVE_CHAT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_INTERACTIVE_CHAT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.56.815484000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,call_center_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,call_center_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_interactive_chat;

body.name: DA_INTERACTIVE_CHAT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_INTERACTIVE_CHAT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.56.825962000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_interactive_chat.add(fx), parms=' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_interactive_chat a
(
a.call_center_event_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_call_center_event_id.NEXTVAL
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.call_center_event_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_interactive_chat.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_interactive_chat.add, parms=' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_interactive_chat a
(
a.call_center_event_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_call_center_event_id.NEXTVAL
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_interactive_chat.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,call_center_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_interactive_chat.add, parms=' || call_center_event_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_interactive_chat a
(
a.call_center_event_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.call_center_event_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_interactive_chat.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,call_center_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_interactive_chat.del, parms=' || call_center_event_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_interactive_chat a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.call_center_event_id = del.call_center_event_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_interactive_chat.del');

END del;

END da_interactive_chat;
